amendment.description: Amendment sought to require specific disclosure of information related to filing agency petitions to the Financial Stability Oversight Council to overturn Consumer Financial Protection Bureau rulemaking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-172 to require specific disclosure of information related to filing agency petitions to the Financial Stability Oversight Council to overturn Consumer Financial Protection Bureau rulemaking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 238 (Roll no. 616).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Miller (NC).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 238 (Roll no. 616).
